entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
